show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: How Much More Debt Can You Personally Tolerate?

title: How Much More Debt Can You Personally Tolerate?
content:
We are beyond the point where it is necessary to repeat the facts here. <!--more--> The question now is whether you can endure a life of indentured servitude to the banks because either you dared to buy a house or get educated or because you will be financing the debt your parents contracted for the rest of your life.
It really doesn’t make any sense, does it?
Escape is the only solution.
Join the Richard Martin Meet-Up Group this weekend (10/27) in New Brunswick to learn how.
(See above for details).
You will not regret it.
Dylan Ratigan’s rant on the unwillingness of anyone in power to address the national debt.
The truth about “Obama’s Shrinking Deficits”.
A bubble in beer!
Problems at the USPS.
People selling body parts (to celebrate the Recovery?
) The ever-declining economic environment as evidenced by constantly receding consumer spending.
